name: Marina View B&B

reviews.text: We stayed at the Marina View in July of 2009 and loved every minute of it. The rooms were clean, comfortable and had an amazing view. Every morning we woke-up to the smell of freah bread being baked for us!! Mila, was an amazing wealth of knowledge and really added to our time in Barcelona. We had asked if we could leave our luggage there for a couple hours after we had checked out because we had an evening train to Madrid and she said no problem. We left our final payment on our bed and when we returned, all of our cash was sitting on our luggage because they were not sure what it was for. It was just another example of the character of the hotel.
reviews.title: What a wonderful find

reviews.text: Our family of 6 (4 teenagers aged 12-18) stayed 3 nights pre-cruise at Marina View B and B. Our rooms were spacious, the beds and pillows firm but comfortable and the linens were of good quality. The room had a safe which was very useful. Our breakfast was delicious; fresh pastries, breads, cheese, juice and coffee, much more than we could possibly consume. Excellent bathrooms and showers in each of the two rooms we used (3 to a room, one double bed and a futon-type day bed or hide-a-bed). Small balcony/French window in each room gave us a wonderful view of the harbour and the activites in the port tourist areas and was a fantastic viewpoint for watching the fireworks one night. There was a small elevator to the floor where both our rooms were located (Maremagnum room and Columbus room) in this historic old stone mansion right across the street from the marina, Olympic plaza, Port Vell, restaurants and just around the corner from La Rambla. The sightseeing bus stop was right across the street. Easy walk to Plaza Catalunya and Gothic Quarter. A taxi to the cruise ship terminal at the end of our stay was reasonable in price (we needed a van for 6 of us and luggage) and it was a very short trip to the terminal, the taxi dropping us off right in front of our cruise check-in line. Getting to the B and B on the first day from the airport to Drassanes train stop was simple but crowded and busy (beware of pickpockets who are on the trains. It happened to us). You emerge from underground at Drassanes stop and then a short 5 minute walk with rolling luggage to the B and B.
reviews.title: Perfect location, friendly staff

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Jose-Maria and Mila our hosts were extremely friendly, very helpful in recommending sightseeing and restaurants.
reviews.title: Awesome Stay

reviews.text: We chose this place to stay in Barcelona primarily because of the reviews on this website and we were not disappointed. First, the location was excellent, close to everything and we had a very nice view from our balcony in the Maremagnum Room. This room was a triple with a large bed for my husband and me, and a comfortable single for our 23 year old son, and everything was super clean. Mila and Jose Maria, our hosts were so welcoming and helpful, and so genuine. You could feel that they really wanted you to feel welcome and to get the most out of your trip to Barcelona. The breakfast was timely and delicious, taxis were hailed when needed and directions in Spanish were given to the drivers, and always done with a smile. I hope that we will be lucky enough to stay there again if we ever visit Barcelona again. Two things that we really enjoyed were the fat tire bike tour (a great way to see everything from historical sites, Gaudi's architecture, to the beaches) and the flamenco dinner & show at Tablao Cordobes (very high energy), both of which were located close to this B&B.
reviews.title: Great B&B - great location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This is a great B&B: excellent location, super friendly, helpful and profesional service, impecable room infrastructure. We had the Maremagnum room and the view was splendid. Never mind the noisy avenue, the room is calm and sunny, although a bit small (maybe because we had a double bed + a single bed).
reviews.title: Mila's personal touch made a wonderful stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We had one night in Barcelona after our cruise and stayed at the Marina View. We had a real early flight the next morning and debated staying near the airport. This was the perfect location. We figured it would have cost us $60 to get to the airport, check in, then another $60 getting back to Las Ramblas for sightseeing, then another $60 back that night. Not to mention the time wasted. Marina View is a short cab ride from the port, right on the main street, a few steps from Las Ramblas. Though the outside is nondescript, the rooms are clean, roomy, well decorated and very reasonable! Mila was such a help to us. She let us use her computer to check in for our flight. She suggested sites and restaurants. Importantly for us, she arranged the cab to the airport so we would be sure to have a ride and not be ripped off. Then she even got up 4am and waited with us to make sure the cab was there and on time! Even though we had to leave too early for breakfast, she had coffee and sweets for us in the room for the morning, which was perfectly hot in the thermos. We were there with another couple and it was the perfect place for us! We recommend it wholeheartedly.
reviews.title: Great Cruise Location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Location is fantastic and the place is run very, very well. We stayed in a newly refinished suite (I think it was called the Captain's Suite, or something like that) which was very nicely decorated and spacious. The owners couldn't have been more helpful. Excellent value for the money. Deserves its high TripAdvisor rating.
reviews.title: Absolutely deserves its high ratings

reviews.text: Marina View is a great place to stay in Barcelona. It's position overlooking the marina and next to Las Ramblas and the Gothic Quarter couldn't be better. The rooms were clean and beautifully decorated. The level of service was incredible - so friendly and willing to help with the slightest problem. We really enjoyed our stay and hope to return in the future.
reviews.title: Spotless and spot on.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We chose this B&B, as it has wonderful reviews. All are accurate. Mila was so helpful and kind. We took a cab from the airport- as we were very tired. Just so you know it cost us around 30 Euro's. We had no clue what it should cost, so that might help give you a guideline.
reviews.title: Perfect Location to see it all in Barcelona!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We got the Fisherman's Room, which was very basic. No view, and in fact hardly a window, as the next building ( not a very attractive building- garbage, etc) is a few inches away. So you won't get much light or a view in that particular room. Since we were staying at some pretty pricey places later on in our trip, we didn't mind, as this particular room is obviously cheaper. However, I think I would stay in one of the rooms with the water view next time. Probably worth the extra cost.
reviews.title: You will think you died and now live in Barcelona

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Jose Marie and Mila made our two night stay at Marina View very special. We stayed there for two nights before our 12 day cruise. They could not have been more helpful in suggesting places to see and where to dine. The continental breakfast was more than enough for my husband and I and was delivered to our room at a time we requested. It was so nice staying at a place with such a gracious host and hostess.
reviews.title: Marina View B & B is a place where you feel right at home.

reviews.text: Stayed with Marina View with a few mates back in June - hosts very welcoming, rooms spacious for Euro standards and location very handy for heading out to enjoy the city for the night and catching the ferry the next morning. Recovered on the beach in the morning which was a short hop. All in all, good stay and would defintiely recommend to others.
reviews.title: Very Good

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Simply, believe all of the positive reviews about the Marina View. The location is really convenient for the whole of the city being near to bus stops, metro stations and even close enough to walk the Ramblas, Gothic quarter, Port Vell and the beaches. Mila is a first class host and nothing is too much trouble. The rooms are spotless, the breakfasts plentiful with many touches you would normally only expect from an expensive hotel (We were even treated to a bottle of champagne on ice after Mila discovered we were visiting to celebrate our wedding anniversary). I would definitely recommend the Marina View and would not want to stay anywhere else if visiting Barcelona again.
reviews.title: Superb

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We arrived late in the evening but despite this we were well looked after and provided with lots of helpful information which helped us to make the best of our short stay. We were helped with everything from restaurants to insect bites. All the staff were pleasant and SMILED! Continental breakfasts were generousand the laptops available for guests were invaluable when it was necessary to have contact with home. We have no hesitation in recommending this superior B&B to anyone.
reviews.title: Great place to stay with helpful and welcoming hosts.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Location- It's hard to imagine a better location. It is located across from the harbor so it's perfect for those waiting to catch a cruise but it's also perfect for accessing the metro and the rambles which is essentially a large boulevard with open cafes and vendors. We had friends staying uptown but they ended up spending far more time in our area due to our location.
reviews.title: Marina View was Perfect for us

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We recently stayed at Marina View B&B for our 3 days in Barcelona. We found this to be a great place! As always Trip Advisor is spot on with the reviews. Mila our host, is a gracious host full of energy and always willing to help out with any questions. The location was perfect. Located only several blocks from the Drassans Metro Station and right next to the La Rambla. Our room overlooked the beautiful Marina below and was our haven from the at hectic masses of people in Barcelona. ( we found out that it was a holiday during our stay) Here is the review below:
reviews.title: Great Bed and Breakfast... Close to all everything in Barcelona!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Room: Room was nice and clean with comfortable bed. Bathroom and shower were large and adequate and again clean and updated. We had a nice balcony to overlook the Marina below….great for those sunrises and sunsets.
reviews.title: Intro to Barcelona

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: A breakfast was served every morning to our room at a designated time we placed on a sheet the night before. Breakfast consisted of fresh crouissants/rolls with fresh juice and tea. No protein such as eggs or cheeses/meats but breakfast was great.
reviews.title: Great Location, Great Hosts, Great B&B
wonderful B+B
reviews.text: We also had free Wi-Fi in the room for our personal laptop that we used. Another bonus was the elevator that you could take up to the 4th floor of the B&B, a bonus with heavy luggage.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2009, traveled as a couple

reviews.title: Wonderful views, great service

description: Located on the seafront promenade our elegant residence offers you the privilege of a Mediterranean view from the very heart of the city. With due respect for the classic style of our 19th century residence, the rooms have been completely renovated in order to offer you maximum comfort. We are near from the beaches and surrounded by some of Europe's most impressive historical, artistic and architectural monuments.
